MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 08-DEC-2020 13:31.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the TD14 postcode area of Eyemouth. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.30am to complete a repair on an underground cable located at Crosslaw Caravan Park and return power to mains supply after the storm damage last week and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.47am on Tuesday 8th December 2020.
